fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article said the Brexit party was “formed just six weeks ago”. It was registered with the Electoral Commission on 5 February and publicly launched in early April (Buoyant Farage tells supporters: we must be ready for a general election, 28 May, page 4). • We misspelled the family name of the actor Guy Pearce as Pierce in a picture caption (Ellroy passes judgment on LA Confidential film, 3 June, page 13). • Other recently corrected articles include: Bananas in art: a short history of the salacious, disturbing and censored fruit Two experts added to Grenfell inquiry to broaden oversight David Thouless obituary
